response: Oh my love, you bring me so much joy - young and vibrant, full of life and energy! Your love is a never-ending source of peace - glorious and wonderful, filling my heart with happiness and laughter. Every moment with you is a pleasure - terrible if we are apart, but wonderful when we are together. You are the light of my life, my heart's delight - evil and nasty thoughts cannot touch us, for our love is pure and true. Together, we create a world of happiness and wonder - failure is not an option, for our love will conquer all!
